programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee

programme.title: Jesus Town, U.S.A.

Despite being an 88-year-old tradition, the play is struggling to find an audience and the young man who plays the role of Jesus has a secret revelation that could change everything(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: Split Persona
programme.desc: The bond between twin sisters starts to fray when their mother starts showing signs of suicidal depression. Still, they need each other - but have they grown too far apart? Directed by Bradley Rust Gray. Written by Mayraleeh Nelson(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs(n)

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. programme.title: All-Stars

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer(n)

programme.title: All or Nothing
programme.desc: Filmmaker Mike Leigh delivers another glimpse of British working-class life with a moving, humanistic tale capturing both the desperation and bittersweet humor of its subjects' lives. Phil (Timothy Spall), a scruffy cab driver, his common-law life Penny (Lesley Manville) and their two overweight children reside in one of South London's ubiquitous concrete housing developments. When an unexpected crisis descends upon Phil and Penny, they are forced to face and affirm some of life's timeless verities. "Richly satisfying" ("The Guardian")(n)

programme.title: SXSW Comedy Night Two with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the second of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Todd Glass, Wyatt Cenac, Iliza Shlesinger, Rachel Feinstein, Nate Bargatze, Matt Braunger, Mark Normand, Beth Stelling, Joe DeRosa and Jon Huck(n)

programme.title: Let Us Prey

programme.title: Freedom

Stars Cuba Gooding Jr(n)

programme.title: Sister

programme.title: Burning Bodhi

programme.title: Fried Green Tomatoes

programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms

programme.title: Tale of Tales

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend(n)

As Burroughs courts the woman who would become his second wife, the pair are drawn into the lives of poets Jack Kerouac and Allen Ginsberg and their world of sex, violence and unbridled creativity. Costars Courtney Love(n)

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her(n)

programme.desc: After breaking up with his girlfriend, a young man decides to end it all, only to discover a run-down afterlife that is strikingly similar to his old one. When he discovers his ex-girlfriend is there too, he sets out on an absurd road trip through purgatory to find her(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: Jackson

programme.title: It Runs in the Family (2003)
programme.desc: Michael Douglas and his legendary actor father Kirk Douglas team up on-screen for the first time with this comedy about a successful businessman whose midlife crisis inspires him to reach out to several generations of his family, with decidedly comic results. Bernadette Peters costars(n)

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change(n)

programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day(n)

programme.title: Austin Powers The Spy Who Shagged Me

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 10)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 13)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV(n)

programme.title: Z pamiętnika lekarki (odc. 13)
programme.desc: Doktor Gretchen Haase (Diana Amft) ma złamane serce, kilka kilogramów nadwagi i nadzieję na szczęśliwą odmianę losu. Na razie porzucona przez niewiernego narzeczonego wraca do rodzinnego domu, gdzie musi wysłuchiwać narzekań matki, Barbary, która chętnie widziałaby ją na ślubnym ołtarzu. Lekarka ze zmiennym szczęściem walczy też ze swoją największą namiętnością - jedzeniem. Za radą ojca Gretchen poświęca się robieniu kariery. W pracy nieoczekiwanie wikła się w miłosny trójkąt z dwoma kolegami ze szpitalnego oddziału - dawnym znajomym ze szkoły, ordynatorem Markiem Meierem (Florian David Fitz) i wrażliwym ginekologiem doktorem Mehdim Kaanem (Kai Schumann). Odtąd operacje, diety i dwaj interesujący mężczyźni stanowią codzienność doktor Haase(n)

programme.title: Show Me What You're Made Of
programme.desc: Our five spoilt kids head next to a thriving British textiles factory in the heart of the midlands, Leicester. The busy factory the kids set to work in makes fashion clothes for British high street names and UK supermarkets and so the work has to be done to a very high standard. Plus, as the factory is competing against cheap imports from China the targets here are very strict - everything has to be done in silence, at speed and with no compromise on quality. How will our kids cope when they are put to work on a real stitching line reporting to the strict factory boss Mick who makes sure his workers deliver quality work at all times? And when one of the team shows real promise, how do those who are lagging behind react? Presented by Stacey Dooley(n)

programme.title: My Life
programme.desc: With just 2 years' experience, Scottish teenager Iona has only five months to prepare for the biggest international competition of her life, the World Junior Surf Championships in the Azores, Portugal. It's a race against time as she trains in sub-zero conditions and battles the unpredictable seas of her home shores to find the perfect wave. It's punishing but day after day Iona dons her wetsuit and dives in. But surfing off Scotland's coast is a world away from the warm, volcanic waters of the Azores, where Iona will be up against the gnarliest (treacherous) waves she has ever faced as well as some of the most experienced and fearless surfers on the planet. Determined not to let herself or her country down, will Iona master the surf - and the pressure - to come home a champion?(n)

programme.title: My Life
programme.sub-title: My Life: Our Desert Island Home.
programme.desc: My Life: Our Desert Island Home follows the adventures of brothers Felix (11) and Luca (10) who live on an Island called Fofoa in Tonga. After living through the worst tropical cyclone in memory, Felix and Luca enlist a local conservation charity to help them survey their coral reef to see the effects of the storm and check the long term damage from climate change. Protecting the marine life is vital to keep attracting the migrating whales back every year, not least because the boys' favourite hobby is taking visitors swimming to meet these magnificent animals. Join Felix and Luca as they show you what living on an Island is all about(n)

programme.desc: My Life: Our Desert Island Home follows the adventures of brothers Felix (11) and Luca (10) who live on an Island called Fofoa in Tonga. After living through the worst tropical cyclone in memory, Felix and Luca enlist a local conservation charity to help them survey their coral reef to see the effects of the storm and check the long term damage from climate change. Protecting the marine life is vital to keep attracting the migrating whales back every year, not least because the boys' favourite hobby is taking visitors swimming to meet these magnificent animals.
